title: Hotham Sound
text: Hotham Sound is a sidewater of <a href="Jervis%20Inlet">Jervis Inlet</a> on the <a href="British%20Columbia%20Coast">South Coast</a> of <a href="British%20Columbia">British Columbia</a>, Canada, located near the mouth of that inlet on the north flank of its lower reaches, roughly opposite the mouth of <a href="Sechelt%20Inlet">Sechelt Inlet</a>. There is a deep basin at its entrance reaching a depth of . <a href="Harmony%20Islands%20Marine%20Provincial%20Park">Harmony Islands Marine Provincial Park</a> is located on the east side of Hotham Sound. The spectacular Harmony Falls, also called Freil Lake Falls, plunges a total of into the Sound.
